mapper.insert: INSERT INTO ReplyList (`reply_parent`, `reply_writer`, `reply_contents`, `reply_proj_id`, `reply_board_id`, `reply_pw`, `reply_reg_date`, reply_secret, reply_depth, reply_parent_mem_id) VALUES (#{replyParent}, #{replyWriter}, #{replyContents}, #{replyProjId}, #{replyBoardId}, #{replyPw}, now(), #{replySecret}, #{replyDepth}, #{replyParentMemId});
mapper.select: SELECT reply_id, reply_parent, reply_contents, reply_proj_id, reply_board_id, reply_secret, reply_pw, date_format(reply_reg_date, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i') as reply_reg_date, reply_depth, reply_parent_mem_id, (select mem_nick from MemList where mem_id = reply_parent_mem_id) as reply_parent_nick, (select mem_nick from MemList where mem_id = reply_writer) as reply_writer FROM ReplyList WHERE reply_proj_id = #{replyProjId} ORDER BY reply_parent
